name: Hamster LOOP
description:
Oh no, poor hamster is stuck in his wheel. :(
Can it get all the sunflower seeds it needs to complete the ancient ritual and summon the great ones?
Will it perish in the hands of evil worms?

Well, YOU DECIDE!

---------------------------------------------

Controls:
- MOUSE LEFT CLICK - Menus
- A,D - move
- SPACEBAR - jump
